channel.title: What is Programming? on Jian Liew
channel.description: Recent content in What is Programming? on Jian Liew

item.title: Pragmatic Programmer
item.description: Before we start, there is a need to know that …. Shared Directories are NOT Version Control It is common to store source codes using Google Drive, DropBox or OneDrive. However, this is actually not a good practice at all. Whenever we are programming, one of the most common feature that we often look out for would be the undo key. The problem with the undo key that it is not a time machine.
